 Admissions & Studies 

The AGH University educates around 21,000 students
and offers nearly 70 fields of study at 17 faculties. 

The university’s offer includes the AGH University Doctoral School with 17 disciplines and more than 100 professional courses. We currently offer 23 degree programmes taught entirely in English (first-cycle = Bachelor’s, second-cycle = Master’s, and specialties) and more than 100 courses available each semester within the 'AGH University International Courses' base of electives. Each year, the AGH University hosts students from all over the world, which surely contributes to its international atmosphere.

The AGH University Department for International Students (DIS) provides full- and part-time international students, as well as exchange students, with the assistance they may require. DIS supports exchange students who come to the university through Erasmus+, SMILE, Fulbright, and many other programmes. We boast around 1,000 agreements that include general agreements, double diploma agreements, Erasmus+, and SMILE bilateral agreements.

 Department for International Students 

The employees of the Department for International Students will help you at each stage of your application process and stay at our university.
